title: Snow-White and Rose-Red
description: Publisher: Checkerboard Press under Rand McNally & CoThis thematic distant cousin to "Beauty and the Beast" tells of two young beauties befriending a bear who is actually a prince under an evil spell. After they rescue an ungrateful dwarf three times, the girls witness the bear's assault on the dwarf and the prince's release from the spell.
author: Marjorie Cooper
